p: Multiple sequence alignment was performed by using the Muscle method implemented in Mega program (v 6.06) ( http://www.megasoftware.net/) [ 17]. The phylogenetic trees were constructed applying the neighbor-joining method with KimuraÂ´s two-parameter distance model [ 18, 19]. For each tree, the reliability of phylogenetic groupings was determined through a bootstrap analysis with 1000 replicates. Only bootstrap values above 70% were identified as distinct groups [ 20]. The trees were visualized using Fig Tree version 1.4.2 ( http://tree.bio.ed.ac.uk/software/figtree).
